children.name: endValue
Fading an element in to 50% opacity

children.description: Sets the final **opacity** value of the element. 1 means the element will be fully opaque. 0 means that the element will be fully transparent.

children.name: startValue
Fading an element out, starting from 50%

children.description: Sets the initial **opacity** value of the element. 1 means the element will be fully opaque. 0 means that the element will be fully transparent.
